CrystalPlayer Class Reference

The interface to the Crystal gifting functionality and player info This class updates automatically from the server after the user calls startUpdating. The class provides access to various pieces of information about the user and can be used to improve the UI of the game and integrate more completely with the Crystal SDK. For more details on the information provided see the properties available. More...

#import <CrystalPlayer.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(void) - startUpdating
 Instructs the SDK to start keeping the CrystalPlayer class up-to-date with the current player's info Because this method initiates network traffic and server load it is important that apps refrain from calling the method unless the CrystalPlayer data is used.
(BOOL) - playerInfoIsUpToDate
 Returns YES if the info for the curent player is up-to-date Crystal will make every effort to keep the data up-to-date, so as long as the device has an Internet connection it should be rare that this method returns NO.

 Returns the shared singleton instance of CrystalPlayer.

Detailed Description

The interface to the Crystal gifting functionality and player info This class updates automatically from the server after the user calls startUpdating. The class provides access to various pieces of information about the user and can be used to improve the UI of the game and integrate more completely with the Crystal SDK. For more details on the information provided see the properties available.

Class describing the CrystalPlayer.

Member Function Documentation

- (BOOL) playerInfoIsUpToDate

Returns YES if the info for the curent player is up-to-date Crystal will make every effort to keep the data up-to-date, so as long as the device has an Internet connection it should be rare that this method returns NO.

+ (CrystalPlayer*) sharedInstance

Returns the shared singleton instance of CrystalPlayer.

- (void) startUpdating

Instructs the SDK to start keeping the CrystalPlayer class up-to-date with the current player's info Because this method initiates network traffic and server load it is important that apps refrain from calling the method unless the CrystalPlayer data is used.

Member Data Documentation

- (string) alias

The player's current alias in Crystal.

- (int) badgeNumber

The badge number that Crystal will set for the application icon and that can be shown over the Crystal button in-game. If you don't want to go to the effort of implementing the badges a >0 value can be used to highlight the Crystal button somehow. The badge number will indicate that the user has outstanding gifts, friend requests or challenges.

- (IList<string>) crystalfriendIds

An array of string IDs for each friend of the user, or nil if the user doesn't have any friends.

- (string) crystalPlayerId

Unique identifier for player.

- (IList<int>) gifts

An array of string IDs for each of the gifts owned by the user, or null if the user doesn't have any gifts.

- (bool) isCrystaluser

set to true if the user has signed into Crystal

- (bool) isFacebookUser

Returns true if the user has signed into Crystal and entered their Facebook details.

- (bool) isTwitterUser

Returns YES if the user has signed into Crystal and entered their Twitter details.

- (int) numCrystalFriends

The number of friends this user has.

- (int) numCrystalFriendsWithGame

The number of friends this user has that also own the game.

Property Documentation

- (NSString*) alias [read, assign]

The player's current alias in Crystal

- (unsigned int) badgeNumber [read, assign]

The badge number that Crystal will set for the application icon and that can be shown over the Crystal button in-game. If you don't want to go to the effort of implementing the badges a >0 value can be used to highlight the Crystal button somehow. The badge number will indicate that the user has outstanding gifts, friend requests or challenges.

- (NSArray*) crystalFriendIds [read, assign]

An array of NSString IDs for each friend of the user, or nil if the user doesn't have any friends

- (NSString*) crystalPlayerId [read, assign]

Unique identifier for player

- (id<CrystalPlayerDelegate>) delegate [read, write, assign]
See also:
CrystalPlayerDelegate
- (NSArray*) gifts [read, assign]

An array of NSDecimalNumber IDs for each of the gifts owned by the user, or nil if the user doesn't have any gifts

- (BOOL) isCrystalUser [read, assign]

Returns YES if the user has signed into Crystal

- (BOOL) isFacebookUser [read, assign]

Returns YES if the user has signed into Crystal and entered their Facebook details

- (BOOL) isSignedIn [read, assign]

Returns YES if the user is currently signed into Crystal

- (BOOL) isTwitterUser [read, assign]

Returns YES if the user has signed into Crystal and entered their Twitter details

- (unsigned int) numberOfCrystalFriends [read, assign]

The number of friends this user has

- (unsigned int) numberOfCrystalFriendsWithGame [read, assign]

The number of friends this user has that also own the game
